_comment_azure_token: Get your PAT from https://dev.azure.com/ → Security → Personal Access Tokens with 'Build (read)' and 'Artifact (read)' scopes
_comment_usage: Use with: meso-forge-mirror info --azure conda-forge/staged-recipes --config azure-debug-config.json

_troubleshooting.json_parse_error: If you get 'expected value at line 3 column 1', the API is returning HTML instead of JSON, usually due to missing authentication
_troubleshooting.authentication_required: Azure DevOps APIs require a Personal Access Token even for public repositories
_troubleshooting.html_response: Without authentication, Azure returns an HTML login redirect instead of JSON data
